resources.string: With or spa and massage services you are getting the relaxing touch of an expert. With an aromatic pillow for your eyes, a choice of aroma therapy oil, and a heated pillow for your neck, our massage offerings will restore balance to mind and body.

Our spa manicure and pedicure services soothe with a warm neck pillow. Skin exfoliation and a hydrating massage are extended to the elbow for manicures and to the knee for pedicures, which also include a customized foot bath with essential oil.
